name: Dragon Ball Z: Shin Budokai - Another Road
name_original: Dragon Ball Z: Shin Budokai - Another Road
description:
Dragon Ball Z: Shin Budokai - Another Road is an arcade-fighting game developed by DIMPS. It came out on 20-03-2007. Atari published the game. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended".
Dragon Ball Z: Shin Budokai - Another Road is available on PSP.
